description: Addresses and coordinates of each of 5 special waste drop-off sites where New York City residents can dispose of automotive batteries, motor oil, oil filters, passenger car tires, transmission fluids, fluorescent light bulbs, thermostats, household batteries, and latex paint.

name: Special Waste Drop-off Sites
